content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(3,3)近傍。こちらは(27,14)。まずは最大索敵で左上方面の海域を扇形に偵察。空母は安全距離を保ちつつやや北西へ前進して索敵半径を稼ぐ。島嶼地帯が北西〜西に多いので、航路は海域を縫う必要あり。初動で2隊同時発艦し、(10,6)と(8,10)へ振り分けて左上方面を広くカバー、敵空母の早期発見を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":25,"y":13},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":6}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (10, 6) while at (24, 13).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 13), en route to target (25, 13), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (24, 13), outbound toward (10, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(3,3)近傍想定。初動索敵は継続。BSQ1は北西高緯度(10,6)へ。BSQ2をやや南寄り西方(8,10)に発艦し、扇形で重複最小化。空母はさらに少し北西へ移動して索敵半径を前進・安全距離維持。島嶼は西北西に多いが現在海域は海。敵発見次第、復路報告方向から空母推定して第二波を当てる。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":23,"y":12},"launch_target":{"x":8,"y":10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (8, 10) while at (22, 13).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 13), en route to target (23, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 13), outbound toward (10, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 13), outbound toward (8, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"索敵継続。敵空母は(3,3)近傍と推定。BSQ1を北西高緯度、BSQ2を西北西で扇形索敵中。空母はリスクを抑えつつさらに北西へ前進し、次ターン以降の追加索敵・攻撃半径を確保する。現状敵影なし、編隊は往路での発見・即攻撃を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":21,"y":11},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 11), en route to target (21, 11), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 11), outbound toward (10, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 13), outbound toward (8, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"索敵継続。敵は左上(3,3)近傍想定。BSQ1/2は扇形で北西〜西北西を探索中。こちら空母は過度に接近せず北西へ進出して次の再発艦半径を拡大。敵影報告なしなのでこのまま前進しつつ、次の扇区（さらに北側）を次波で狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":19,"y":10},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 18) while at (17, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 9) while at (14, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 9) (previously at (9, 9)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 18) (previously at (15, 18)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 11), en route to target (19, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 9), outbound toward (9, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 13), outbound toward (8, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1を(9,9)で捕捉。BSQ1は即攻撃に移行中。BSQ2も北側(8,10)へ向かっており接触圏内。こちら空母は敵の反撃航空隊ASQ1(15,18)を南方で探知、敵空母は(9,9)付近にいる可能性が高いので、被発見リスクを抑えつつやや西へ前進して後続波発艦半径を確保。今ターンは追加発艦不要、空母位置秘匿と回避機動を優先。次ターン、命中・位置更新に合わせて再攻撃コースを設定する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":18,"y":10},"launch_target":null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 11), outbound toward (9, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母を(9,9)で捉えBSQ1が攻撃中、BSQ2も突入コース。敵機ASQ1は南方(15,18)で目撃、こちら空母への脅威になり得るため位置秘匿と回避機動を継続。空母は西へ寄せて再発艦半径を維持しつつ敵の推定攻撃軸から外れる。現時点では新たな発艦指示不要、まずは命中結果を待つ。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":10},"launch_target":null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 10), engaging an enemy target at (9, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母(9,9)にBSQ1が22ダメージ。BSQ2が追撃中。敵ASQ1は(15,18)で南方、こちらへの帰投経路と交差しにくい。空母は発艦半径を保ちつつ西へ前進し、次波準備と敵の推定攻撃軸からの回避を両立。BSQ1は帰投、BSQ2の命中後位置更新を見て再度扇形で再攻撃を用意。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":9},"launch_target":null}}
